name: @nuxt/a11y
description: Nuxt module to provide accessibility hinting and utilities.

scripts.build: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxt-module-build build && npm run client:build
scripts.dev:prepare: nuxt-module-build build --stub && nuxt-module-build prepare && nuxt prepare client && nuxt prepare playground
scripts.play:prod: npm run build && nuxt dev playground
scripts.release: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run prepack && changelogen --release && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.test:types: vue-tsc --noEmit && cd playground && vue-tsc -b --noEmit && cd ../client && vue-tsc -b --noEmit
